name: Star Sandwich
description:
Pilot your trusty KetShip through the void sandwich.  Shoot sandwich ingredients with sticky ketchup which pulls it down to the bread. how does this work without gravity? magic. you must cover the whole peice of bread before moving on to another layer.  Once you sufficiantly cover the whole slice of bread in multiple layers the top half will come down and you will win. (or the game will glitch maybe. idk its 2:30 and i need to get to sleep.) 

 It was probably more fun before I fixed the spawn glitch.
